name: The Crown and the Ring Tactics
name_original: The Crown and the Ring Tactics
description:
Take charge of a team of special forces in a world of swords and sorcery.  This is a strategy RPG similar to games like Fire Emblem.

If you enjoy the game and would like to support development, you can join my Patreon.  Thank you very much.

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=75371673&fan_landing=true
